So i finally beat FF12 a while back and have been meaning to write what i feel about it. Don't read if you don't want lawl spoilers. 

[spoiler]Basically the whole premise is that long ago, when the gods created the humes, they shortly learned that the humes ambition and greed was to much for Ivalice. After years of war, the gods decided it was time to take matters into their own hands. Naming a hero of ivalice, the dynast king they gave him the power of nethecite, stones powerful enough to destroy entire countries. With the netecite and the magical swords, he united the entire world, as the gods commanded and so it was with magic stones and their hands in history, the gods manipulated hume history to keep them inline when ever they felt like they were getting out of hand. each major kingdom having one of the stones. Foward to years before 12, and  Cid balthansa finds out about the stones other countries have.As the empire extends, it gains a hold of some of them, using them to create artificial nethecite, magic stones with out the need for nature or gods to empower them. Seeking more of the stones, at the behest of Cid, the empire attacks Nabradia, where the power of one of the stones is let loose, destroying the country. After that, the empire turns it's eye towards Rabenastre, hoping to get the stone they possess. To what end was all this? cid, and Vayne solidor wished for one thing. After learning about the gods control on history and their power over humes from the dark god Vena, traitor to the gods, they decided that enough was enough. it was time for people to take back history into their own hands, not let the gods control them any more. And so goes the rest of the story of final fantasy 12. Her kingdom ruined by the empire, Princess ashelia  Sets out to find power enough to fight the empire. Coming upon her own nethecite and the two swords granted by the gods that could destroy the stones. In geruvegan her destiny made manifest, she was to be the new dynast king, destroy the empire and return the world to what the gods felt it was to be. She did not, but instead fought with her own power against the empire, firstly destroying the sun cyst. The stone from which all nethecite was cut, and freeing the world from the curse of the stones. Vayne, wished to see himself as the new dynast king, but one for which humes would follow into a new era without gods. And so the rebelion led by the Marquis ondore challenged the empire, lead by the flagship Bahamut, where Vayne and ashelia fought. Their goals the same, but means different, so inthe end did one have to die. However the empire needed an heir, or the would would be divided by civil war, so it was that Larsa solidor was named new emperor.[/spoiler]

SO yeah.. can you really say you don't feel bad for Vayne and what he was trying to accomplise? would you do the same thing, if you knew what he knew?.. i think i would, if i knew our lives were controlled and history pre determined by the gods, and had the power to allow humanity it's own destiny. I couldn't say i would not do the same.. would you challenge the gods themselves for what you beleive in?

So me and nate have started playing alundra to see if it's as awsome as we remember. It is. Game isn't as hard as we remembered, but then again one would hope we've gotten smarter at puzzle solving as we've gotten older. The story is still good, and so many sad deaths. Just finished kline's dream ( DAMN YOU ICE PILLARS), death rate is at 6 people so far.  Playing it has made me sad it will never get a good sequal, and even more sad that so many people will never play it, regulated to thinking legend of zelda is the best adventure game ever made , OMG !!!11!1!!!1
seriously, ALundra kicks the shit out of zelda is almost every way. Oh well, at least i get to enjoy it.

I've been tagged,once I counter tag you, you have to write a blog with six random facts about yourself. In the end you need to choose six people to be tagged and list their names.


1. I read all of the lord of the rings books and many of steven kings books before I was 9.
2. I can speed read, which means i can go through sentences only picking out parts of the words down allowing me to read a several hundred page book in one night if I really tried.
3. I'm secretly a really big star wars nerd, i can probably tell you anything about the old republic, empire, or extended universe you want to know >.>.
4. I originally wanted to be an architect when i was younger.
5. When something makes me really upset i tend to tear up out of frustration since im not prone to just hit things or explode.
6. The first rpg i ever played was final fantasy mystic quest, it's a horrible game in retrospect.

If they could just get that down they would be solid. Im going up to Chigago tomorrow to visit my old friends Marsh and robin, and what turned into about 6 of us from ohio going up has turned into about 20-30 of our guild mates all meeting outside Chigago at a Wings place to hang out all day, >.> wow it'll be weird to meet a lot of the people i play with but they are all great people. Sadly some of the ones i wanted to meet can't come because of children/husbands/wives/work but that's life. I gotta start getting x-mas presents for every one, i preaty much figured out what im getting most people. Our new little kitten Auron(allyson's x-mas present) is a little bundle of cute mixed with hyper. When he's just laying around or being silly he's cute as hell but he likes to attack feet while your sleeping or eat books so we have to stop him from doing that.Any way im waiting for a call from Anthony to go see king kong so i'll update more when i get back.

That is the name of my pet hedge hog , she is so cute it's crazy. of course she is still very scared of people, especially new people but im hoping she gets over it eventually. She is eating and drinking regularly so that is a good sign, she is also using her running wheel so she's getting excercise. It just sucks having a nocturnal pet when you have to be in bed by midnight. She freakin sleeps all day. On other stuff every one look at this link, WATCH IT , and then cry for america like you should ..http://www.piclibs.com/videos.php?id=72 . The daily show brings into perspective the ridiulous state of people within politics and politics within people in this country. Their coverage of the Liberal march on washington was hilarious, i love how objective and non sided they are, making fun of every one makes your views a lot more viable then being one sided, especially on such things. I recommend every one watch the daily show, and if it offends your political or religious views, stop and think why your not even able to laugh at yourself, your not perfect so get over it. Laughing will make things better in the long run and hopefully one day we'll all realize how dumb we really are most of the time, at least when our opinions overide common sense. And if you can watch the this week in god segment about hurricane Katrina being sent by god to punish the sinful. The best part, how televangilist said that the hurricane was brought down on the day of a gay pride march in the french quarter and was a sign that god was punishing the gays yet that was one of the least flooded and damaged areas, so apparenlty god loves gays and hates those adjacent to gays... good times. Hate and such.

Going up to lorain this weekend, should be fun, but no WoW will be annoying, at least it'll give me time to study Japanese. My social stratifications of people in society class is easy sauce, just a lot of general knowledge on racism and schemas within groups in America, nothing bad at all. Geography isn't to bad, a lot mroe math then i thought it would be but nothing beyojnd highschool knowledge. Japanese is going to kick my ass though, i need to really work harder at it, but even in this past week and a half i've learned a lot more about the language then i knew before, it's sweet to actually learn stuff and be challenged, but at the same time a bit annoying. Oh well ces't la vie. I'll figure something out to write about next time, but for now i say all my friends must see my cute hedgie and don't let yourself be blinded by your own beliefs to the larger world and that thing called common sense, it's a good friend to have.

P.S. Purple monkey dishwasher(10 pts to whoever knows where that quote is from)
oh i know, next time i'll put up this awsome article from the OSU paper about Ann Coulter, that stupid self rightious , cock juggling thunder cunt(name that quote too).

Ok so it wasn't the day after, you can all kiss my ass! Any way life has been good, College started, and getting up early sucks like no bodies buisness. Japanese class is really fun, but i know i'm going to really have to try because they don't slow down for anything and I WANT to do well in the class, so i guess i'll just put the extra effort into it. My psych class looks fun, no textbook, just lots of books about inequality and people in america trying to live better then they can afford. Our apartment is almost completely done, just a few figues and posters left, it is teh awsome. Tomorrow i go to get my pet baby hedghog(so cute) and play some more WoW table top. I'll post some meaningful post tomorrow about either 1)evolution vs intelligent design or 2) idiotic religious fanatics in america who say that the hurricanes are gods way of destroying the sinful cities of america and are a warning to us all. YES YOU FUCKS BECAUSE GOD GIVES US DAYS OF WARNING!! god i hate those people*stabs televangilist in the face* oh i also started working out, and am sore, but i really and to get in better shape so im gonna suffer and go back again monday, the schools work out area is the size of a freaking building At LCCC, actually it's a LOT bigger, and has 3 pools. Teh awsome. and for those of you wondering i will be back up the weekend of the first so i can show off my baby hedgehog and hang out.

Yes yes it's been a long time since I've updated. Quick overview, I'll make more meaningful post tomorrow.
Otakon was fun, good to catch up with old friends, and friends from anime. Super happy anime was split into two, although the most noise wasn't always from the kids :P. Two of my best friends have left, one for the land of china where adventure abounts- Jonathan. The other for Chicago where a 75k a year job awaits-Marsh. Sucks because the biggest reason I had to go back to Lorain was to play table top games and 40k with Marsh and all those people. Sean and jilly bean are going out, never saw that coming but what ever makes them happy. Me and Allyson have moved down to Columbus, took us a week to get cable and internet, that sucked. Life here is really good, Lots of WoW. Clint, Nate, and Anthony are really cool, and we've been hanging out a lot. Gotta look for a job, job's suck, hopefully i can work at EB games for less suckness. Our guild in WoW absorbed another guild, Twisted hand of fate, so now we are one big guild of about 70 real people, 120 charachters. Our apartment is awsome, gotta start puttting up posters, anime figures abount. Anime Palace store down here in columbus, it rocks. Naruto dub hurts my hears, mainly just Naruto's voice and the shitty ass opening and closing. Gotta hang out with anime friends more next time I'm up in lorain, and Prince of Persia is an awsome game. Huricane sucks, some one in our guild was stuck in it but he's ok, another guild mate had a daughter this week. Daily show is hilarious, Mind of Mencia is hilarious, politically correct people are dumb, and John Stewart should be our next president. More important stuff tomorrow.

Well tonight is my last night here in japan, so i figured i would post the last of the things i learned while here.

1. hentai stuff is expensive.
2. you always win at games when you do not try.
3. The only thing that can beat 2 Arnolds is two Jesus`
4.There have been two recorded deaths due to large boots.
5.The yakuza run a lot of operations in Kobe for some reason
6.Allsyon only remembers things told to her 5 times.
7. there are people more pale then allyson in existance.
8. Jason has a clone.
9. Sumos are more flexible than I am.
10. Advent children is coming out 9/15.
11. Other people from Europe make fun of the french as much as we do.
12. High heels and stockings are common fashion.
13. Japanese children and babies are more cute then any others.
14. Jackass penguins do exist.
15. No one REALLY wants to live in africa.
16. It is ok to listen to a remake of the mario theme song in  a fancy resturant.
17. The japanese like putting vowels at the end of words.
18. Snoopy and disney are popular here.
19. Buddhist temples rock any other religions places.
20. Bleach has a good number of fans here but is not one of the most popular series.
21. People will just talk to you on the street in smaller towns for now reason and practice their english.
22. Pillows should not be made of beads.
23. It is fun to listen to japanese people curse in english.
24. paying 3 dollers for a 1.5 liter of soda makes you cry inside.
25. seeing small water melons for 30 dollers, and 2 apples for 6 makes you cry more.
26. Americans need to walk more.
27. Japan is a great place but has it's own share of problems. Lots of pachinko gambling, hookers, and the selling of people happen in the larger cities.
28.Japanese keyboards suck.
29.  A good number of women wear kimonos in public as their every day cloths.
30. Where as the japanese look good wearing the traditional clothign of their people, we would look stupid in frilly shirts and big wigs.

It's already been a month and no luck, but im lucky my x-box hasn't blown up, if you look on the interent people have totally trashed their x-box's trying to mod version 1.6's frying the hard drive or just making it so it never turns on... i guess im lucky in that. im planning on maybe buying an older used one, putting the insides in my cool green case, and modding it. Yesterday was Allyson's b-day so we just hung out most of the day but I got to go to anime, and that was cool. I can't wait till I can go back all the time.. there just needs to be a way to kill all the little kids and people who talk to damn much. That's always been something that's bugged me. Today we went out for Japanese Hibachi, it was so good, and then came back to my house to eat icecream and watch slayers movies.. mm fatning but very enjoyable to just lay there with your girlfriend and watch funny anime. I ran into Adrian and rico at the mall, hadn't seen them in a while so it was cool to play DDR with them, but i've realized i need to play a lot more,these past 2 weeks without playing has kicked my ass. I also need to start planning my trip to florida this x-mas. Tomorrow is halloween, my favorite elven(aka evil) influenced holiday of the year.. YAY evil.

I talked to a carrier counsler on wensday and got a good push in the direction i want to go, as it seems I'm either going to be staying here for another 2 years to get my bachlors in psychology through CSU and the university partnership, or finishing my associates this fall, and going to OSU next january. Either way will be fine with me. Both have their ups and downs but I know that what ever path I choose i'll do it to my fullest capabilities. Finally getting this much direction about my future has lifted a great burden off me. I've felt like I was doomed not to go any where, afriad of leaving what is and has been because i had nothing in front. But finally I stopped being a whinny bitch and have been doing what i needed to move ahead one way or another. Ya me, i must take Onizuka's wisdom to heart. We can not blame others for our problems, and we definetly can not blame how others turned out on ourselves or peoples besides them. Those who blame others for being bad or the type of person they are try to hide the guilt that is rightly theres. Blame yourself, learn from it and move on. No point in dwelling on things. Next i must learn to ride a dolphin and suplex people. Yes yes it has been a long time since I've posted anything on this damn journal. Sorry about that but I've been kind of blah and the past month or two have sucked like a twelve year old whore. Today im rather good, went to see the Crystal method last night, and the concerts of fucken awsome. It was the first really good day i've had in a long time. I'll explain. See for about the past 2 months i've felt very down and uncaring about a lot of things, many of my friends have problems and situations coming up that I just really don't want to deal with, usually I do but lately I don't. Most day's i feel down, except when im with Marsh,Robin, Sean, Laura,Sarah Bookshar, or Alyson. Because of this i've been avoiding time or doing things with many other people simply because i don't feel comfortable or happy around them. The thing is with my closer friends i don't feel really happy, just normal. But I guess when your feeling low that feeling normal is thus feeling happy, or some such. Any way I really don't know what to do about it and the last time i went to the doctor I asked him about it and he said i might be Clinically depressed. Of course I refuse to go on medications for that kind of thing because it should be taken care of and happy pills just hide problems not fix them. Yesterday was the first really HAPPY day I have had in such a long time I had almost forgot what it was like. It has given me a new desire to change things for the better as well as be happy again, for me and my friends. I've said some things about people not really out of truth but more out of a lack of caring or understanding. If you consider yourself my friend and are reading this but feel that i've kept you outside or anything please understand it's nothing personal, most are in this grouping right now. I don't want to loose any friends, and am going to take care of things but if i loose a friend or two along the way, so be it. I would rather loose a friend or two then all of them. Please understand why im being aloof lately and may be for a bit longer. I only feel really happy when listening to my music, or im with Alyson so I do those more then anything else. I also sleep a lot but im still always tired, a sign that this is more then just an emotional thing. Right now im studying for my human sexuality class. Wish me luck!! ^.^ . Until I figure out what I want, and who I want there, and how im going to be while there please bare with me and understand the following things im going to try to reduce my overall stress and negative outlook on people.

1) Please don't ask me for a ride unless im going to the place you want to go,I really hate being a choufer, especially for those who don't pay or rarely do me the same favor. I understand car's break down and bad shit happens, but that's one thing and being a 20 + year old with out a car is another and I really don't feel like looking down on people who should be better then this. If I was a  chauffeur I'd be making a hell of a lot more money and gas ain't cheap either. Also i drive for a living and more then anything im REALLY getting sick of driving when I don't have to.

2) please don't ask me for money, I've already been very hurt over something to do with money and right now every one can basically kiss my ass when it comes to this. My money is just that, MINE, I work for it, I earn it, I spent it. If I offer money is one thing, but don't come to me for anything I'm sick of people thinking I'm this bank that is always open for buisness and can be forgotten or fucked over. My money was earned with work or blood, yes I have quite a bit of it but you know what; that money was earned with a human beings life and if you don't understand that you can really go fuck yourself.

3) Don't talk bad to me about other people unless I ask what the problem is. This has been a problem since highschool, I've always been friends with a lot of people and many of them weren't friends with each other or outright hated each other. I don't like hearing bad things about my friends, even from my friends. Remember I'm still a person's friend if your not and don't appreciate bad talk behind their backs, just as u don't appreciate it about me and I'm sure you don't about you. Say things to a person's face, it gets things done with quicker. And if your the one pulling shit behind backs and doing stuff you shouldn't and get caught then you fucked yourself over, don't shit where you eat.

4) Please don't assume you understand anything about my dreams, hopes, morals, or desires right now. I barely understand or know them and if I don't how in the hell can you. Remember what they say happens when you assume!! Especially don't think you know how I feel about a situation or person with out asking me because your just going to cause more trouble then is needed and I really hate cleaning up after other people. 

Take care of yourselves and I'll take care of me, right now I'm going to ask very little from others and expect the same in return. As I open back up to my actual friends these things will disapper and hopefully I can be the smart ass, crazy, open, wild, laughing Ian I used to be who loved to be with everyone and keep people together. Please understand I'm a human being too, I make mistakes and feel sad, I cry and hate myself and hate others and am angry with them. But friends get angry with each other, the thing is real friends move on. Sometimes I may not be able to move on, or it may not seem like I can't but I'm only human. Give me some fucken slack. Now if you'll all excuse me im going to talk to a few of my friends who appreciate me for me, don't look for all the things I do wrong, or put down my way of existing, and I know without a doubt care about me and not themselves. Remember this isn't directed at any one person, I've just lost a bit of faith in almost every one. Give me time to get it back, Rome wasn't built in a day. Until then you all take care of yourselves. Love me or leave me, your choice ^.^ we all have free will, and giving up our ability to choose or not choosing is still a choice. Remember that boys and girls, you have no one to blame but yourself, and if your really pathetic or sad blame god. You know since you won't take responsibility for yourself.

I know it's a bit after friday, but whatever who's keeping track ?  >.>...<.<. Any way I learned that there really are good people out there who do nice things just to be a good person, really made me look at people differently. On friday I went to the mall with Lindsey and was going to be late for work, and my car was still in Amherest, so instead of being an hour late, we went to my job, and I was going to use her car to deliver, well i know HOW to drive stick, I just get nervous, and especially in her new car, and making her late to stuff, and well as you can guess being late and all  of it kind of made me have a panic attack while driving to a delivery. Well the coustomers were VERY nice, giving me some juice, and letting me sit and calm down, and one of the guys who looked like a drinking construction worker who you would not usually give the time of day to offered to drive me back to my job out of the goodness of his heart. A bit odd of a guy, but really nice where it counted which made me remember not to judge a book by it's cover. He really did save me and helped  more then I think even he realized because I was on the verge of tears since the panic attack was so bad. I've only done that once, when my mom died, and I don't think I will every cry as much as I did that day. But any way, it was nice to meet a good person and makes me want to help others even more, simply because, if your nice to all you meet, one day some one else like you is going to help you out. I'm going to try to be a little better of a person, and that means for myself as well.      
    I really need to just suck it up and do what makes me happy, and right now that means asking out Allyson, since yes every one and their mom knows I like her but it's ok! plus im glad im going to class more now, makes me feel better about school.
